title: 这个报错是啥意思？
author: zzj666
txt_content:
这个报错是什么原因造成的？如何解决呢？
报错如下

[23:03:34] [Server thread/ERROR]: Couldn't save chunk; already in use by another instance of Minecraft?
net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.ExceptionWorldConflict: Failed to check session lock for world located at .\彼岸, aborting. Stop the server and delete the session.lock in this world to prevent further issues.
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.WorldNBTStorage.checkSession(WorldNBTStorage.java:79) ~[PaperSpigot-1.8.8.jar:git-PaperSpigot-f6fba00-9935adc]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.World.checkSession(World.java:2949) ~[PaperSpigot-1.8.8.jar:git-PaperSpigot-f6fba00-9935adc]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.ChunkRegionLoader.a(ChunkRegionLoader.java:120) ~[PaperSpigot-1.8.8.jar:git-PaperSpigot-f6fba00-9935adc]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.ChunkProviderServer.saveChunk(ChunkProviderServer.java:268) [PaperSpigot-1.8.8.jar:git-PaperSpigot-f6fba00-9935adc]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.ChunkProviderServer.unloadChunks(ChunkProviderServer.java:374) [PaperSpigot-1.8.8.jar:git-PaperSpigot-f6fba00-9935adc]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.WorldServer.doTick(WorldServer.java:234) [PaperSpigot-1.8.8.jar:git-PaperSpigot-f6fba00-9935adc]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.MinecraftServer.B(MinecraftServer.java:826) [PaperSpigot-1.8.8.jar:git-PaperSpigot-f6fba00-9935adc]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.DedicatedServer.B(DedicatedServer.java:378) [PaperSpigot-1.8.8.jar:git-PaperSpigot-f6fba00-9935adc]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.MinecraftServer.A(MinecraftServer.java:710) [PaperSpigot-1.8.8.jar:git-PaperSpigot-f6fba00-9935adc]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:613) [PaperSpigot-1.8.8.jar:git-PaperSpigot-f6fba00-9935adc]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_251]复制代码

replies.author: 蕾米洛伊
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 蕾米洛伊 于 2020-6-17 23:25 编辑 

意思是世界锁有问题
这是什么意思呢
一是有可能你正在运行两个服务器并且都在读写一个世界，这时候为了避免并发读写出现问题，世界会被加锁，那么其中一个服务端就会被锁挡住，无法读取世界，就会自动关闭避免进一步的问题
二是世界损坏或者你在服务器正常开启的时候热删除了一个世界，这时候服务端本来在愉快地对服务器进行读写，突然它找不到锁了，哎，就很难受，就会关闭避免进一步的问题
所以解决方案就是
删除世界前，先完全关闭服务器，不要伤害它的心
或者，请检查是否同时开了两个服务端或者有两个服务端在对同一个世界操作

replies.author: 远远困了
replies.txt_content:
保存区块错误辣！
Failed to check session lock for world located at .\彼岸, aborting. Stop the server and delete the session.lock in this world to prevent further issues
解决方法见3#
不是插件错误

replies.author: MIKAZE3
replies.txt_content:
按照报错内容：
[23:03:34] [Server thread/ERROR]: Couldn't save chunk; already in use by another instance of Minecraft?
看这个意思是你的世界文件被占用了服务器无法读取或写入，请尝试重启你的服务器主机，然后再开服试试看
或者打开任务管理器 将后台带java的都结束掉 然后再启动服务器
